Midtown Arts District Alliance

MADA

What is MADA?

The MADA Alliance is an experimental model for self-governance, co-programming, and resource-sharing between cultural communities located in Santa Fe’s emerging creative nexus: Midtown Arts District.

Current Alliance Members

CENTER Santa Fe

Founded in Santa Fe, New Mexico, in 1994, CENTER is a nonprofit that supports socially and environmentally engaged lens-based projects through education, public platforms, funding, and partnerships.

Help us ensure this vision is realized. Donate to our 2024 $5m fundraising goal.

Photo credit: Name to go here with licensing and approval

By reaching our initial 2024 fundraising goal of $5m, the city of Santa Fe will approve Phase 1 renovations of the disused Visual Arts Center Complex, created by reknowned spanish architect, Legoretto, located at the Midtown Arts District site. Explore the programmatic and architectural vision, developed by our MADA Alliance member, MASS Design Group.

A Shared Mission

We aim to enrich the Santa Fe community by cultivating shared creative spaces that amplify underrepresented voices while fostering equity, unity, and belonging.

This vision stems from extensive community engagement and collaboration spanning five years, where local residents and artists have contributed ideas, hopes, and recommendations that underpin our ambitions.

TKTK

Our Impact Goals

Our mission and goals stem from extensive community engagement and collaboration spanning five years, where local residents and artists have contributed ideas, hopes, and recommendations that underpin our ambitions. Reach out if you want to get involved or have ideas on ways to measure positive impact.

01

Cultural Goals

To bring together Santa Fe’s north and south sides through a creative nexus

02

Economic Goal

To bridge creative practice with education and career pathways for people of all ages

03

Community Goal

To connect Northern New Mexico with artists and creative practitioners globally

04

City Goal

To ensure Santa Fe’s relevance as a cultural and creative mecca for generations to come

Our Focus

Revitalization and Equitable Development

Using a mixed-income model and community-based strategies, we will prioritize deeper resources and leadership development of our local creative ecosystem.

TKTK

Follow our journey.

The Midtown Arts District is a creative nexus that will serve as an extension of our collective stories, reaching from the historic Plaza and Canyon Road to newcomer communities across the city. It will encapsulate the full breadth of creativity, talent, and innovation present in Santa Fe.

MADA (Midtown Art District Alliance) is dedicated to expanding upon Santa Fe's rich histories and diverse cultural narratives, solidifying its status as a globally-recognized creative center and protected heritage site of cultural convergence.

MADAlliance
